name: Simon Property Group, Inc. - Preferred Shares
description: Simon Property Group, Inc. is a leading global real estate investment trust (REIT) that focuses primarily on the ownership, management, and development of premier shopping, dining, entertainment, and mixed-use destinations. Established in 1993 and headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana, Simon is recognized for its extensive portfolio, which includes more than 200 properties across the United States and internationally. The company operates some of the most iconic shopping malls, outlet centers, and retail properties, catering to a diverse range of high-quality brands and retailers. Simon's strategic approach to real estate investment emphasizes long-term value creation, with a commitment to enhancing the customer experience through innovative design and high-quality amenities. In addition to retail properties, Simon is engaged in the development of mixed-use projects that integrate residential and commercial spaces, thereby contributing to vibrant community environments. The company is dedicated to sustainability and has implemented various initiatives to reduce its environmental impact while enhancing operational efficiency. Simon Property Group continues to adapt to the evolving retail landscape by focusing on digital integration and enhancing omnichannel retail experiences, ensuring its position as a leader in the retail real estate sector.
